div.div: User Guide for Creating One PDF File
Chapter . Merging files into one PDF file
Group all your files together into one PDF file.
Select the files you want to merge using Acrobat PDF combiner tool.
Change the document options before publishing one PDF file.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

h1.span: Merging files into one PDF file

div.p: Group all your files together into one PDF file.
div.div:
Some of the known benefits are:
Ease of use
Easy access
Efficiency in sharing files across teams
Optimizing storage space

a.css:oxy-alt-text: Select the files you want to merge using Acrobat PDF combiner tool.
a.title: Select the files you want to merge using Acrobat PDF combiner tool.

a.css:oxy-alt-text: Change the document options before publishing one PDF file.
a.title: Change the document options before publishing one PDF file.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

div.p: Select the files you want to merge using Acrobat PDF combiner tool.

section.p: You should have Acrobat PDF combiner tool installed on your system.
Combine multiple PDF files into a single PDF document.

li.span: Open the PDF combiner tool, and then select Navigator - Publisher Set.
li.div: The Navigator - Publisher Set window opens.

li.span: Under Views, select the files to merge.
Scroll down to Floor Plans, to view list of files selected.

img.alt: List of files visible under Floor Plan section of the window
img.css:oxy-alt-text: List of files visible under Floor Plan section of the window

li.span: Select the Merge to one PDF file .
Select Publish to complete the task.

a.css:oxy-alt-text: Change the document options before publishing one PDF file.
a.title: Change the document options before publishing one PDF file.

div.section: All the files are now merged into one PDF file.

a.css:oxy-alt-text: Change the document options before publishing one PDF file.
a.title: Change the document options before publishing one PDF file.

div.p: Change the document options before publishing one PDF file.

li.span: Under Save PDF with select Color.
Select Include project info in PDF.

a.css:oxy-alt-text: Select the files you want to merge using Acrobat PDF combiner tool.
